item.description:
Endpoints to create, list, detail and delete API user.

Create or delete users are only allowed for the administrator and managers.

Get and list user are only allowed for authenticate users.

item.name: Clients

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.

request.description: Salers could create a new client.

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.

request.description:
Salers could update their client's informations.

Update the url like below:

[http://127.0.0.1:8000/clients/"client_id"/](http://127.0.0.1:8000/projects/)

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.

request.description: Authenticated user could get the list of all clients.

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.

request.description:
Authenticated user could see the detail of a client.

Update the url like below:

[http://127.0.0.1:8000/clients/"client_id"/](http://127.0.0.1:8000/projects/)

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.

request.description:
Salers could delete their client's informations.

Update the url like below:

[http://127.0.0.1:8000/clients/"client_id"](http://127.0.0.1:8000/projects/)/

item.description:
Endpoints to manage clients.

Create clients are only allowed for the salers.

Update or delete a client are only allowed for the saler in contact with this client.

Get and list clients are only allowed for authenticate users.

And, ofcourse,administrator and managers have all permissions.

item.name: Contracts

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.

request.description: Salers could create a new contract.

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.

request.description:
Salers could update their contract's informations.

Update the url like below:

[http://127.0.0.1:8000/contracts/](http://127.0.0.1:8000/projects/)["contract_id"/](http://127.0.0.1:8000/projects/)

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.

request.description: Authenticated user could get the list of all contracts.

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.

request.description:
Authenticated user could see the detail of a contract.

Update the url like below:

[http://127.0.0.1:8000/contracts/"contract_id"/](http://127.0.0.1:8000/projects/)

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.

request.description:
Salers could delete their contract.

Update the url like below:

[http://127.0.0.1:8000/contracts/"contract_id"/](http://127.0.0.1:8000/projects/)

item.description:
Endpoints to manage contracts.

Create contracts are only allowed for the salers.

Update or delete a contract are only allowed for the saler in contact with the client of the contract.

Get and list contracts are only allowed for authenticate users.

And, of course, administrator and managers have all permissions.

item.name: Events

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.

request.description: Salers could create a new event.

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.

request.description:
Saler in contact with the client of the contract and technician who managed the event could update this event.

Update the url like below:

[http://127.0.0.1:8000/events/](http://127.0.0.1:8000/projects/)["event_id"/](http://127.0.0.1:8000/projects/)

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.

request.description: Authenticated user could get the list of all events.

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.

request.description:
Authenticated user could see the detail of an event.

Update the url like below:

[http://127.0.0.1:8000/events/"event_id"/](http://127.0.0.1:8000/projects/)

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.

request.description:
Saler in contact with the client of the contract and technician who managed the event could delete this event.

Update the url like below:

[http://127.0.0.1:8000/events/](http://127.0.0.1:8000/projects/)["event_id"/](http://127.0.0.1:8000/projects/)

item.description:
Endpoints to manage events.

Create events are only allowed for the salers.

Update or delete a event are only allowed for the saler in contact with the client of the contract and by the technician who managed the event.

Get and list events are only allowed for authenticate users.

And, of course, administrator and managers have all permissions.
